data.message: This is really cool, but can someone explain to me how it brings Internet to those places without it.

replies.message: Great question Michael. You can learn more about the specifics of Aquila here: http://bit.ly/29QOBR4. -Brad

I have a really silly question for you....I understand to reduce weight the landing gear is separate from the plane.  How do/did you land the plane without landing gear.  Do you have video of the landing?

Ok. Read specs. Is there a time line where the science is discovered or refined in order to make this eventually workable? Or will the project run out of money before the technology is acquired. Will it be able to land, will it be a controlled crash or will it become falling debris, garbage. ?
Brian Washington  I'm sure they tow the gear. And Catch it  much the same way it took off ,
The far regions cannot connect via satellite dish?
Run out of money?  :-)

My father currently has satellite internet. Either the company is gouging prices knowing that people outside of the reach of cable service have little choice or the technology is still so inefficient that it needs to be expensive with data limits.

I have been blessed with FB ..I'm 91 yrs young
Thank you..💕💕
A satellite connection would be more cost efficient than building solar power airplanes all the time when 1 crashes..
Satellite Internet is good at down link signal but you need a powerful transmitter for the up link signal.

if they would build a transfer station that would pickup the signal than distribute it out it would still be cost efficient but then again comin since is something management and manufactures don't have

I Love living long enough  to see all the wonderful innovation & inventions. I remember quill pens ink wells and paper.!!   However don't count me out, I am up to date  all the new technology and doing it all. Hats off to you and the newAquilla!
Aquila, that is
You mean " common sense " don't you?

Ms. Norma Bailey Gibby you're so blessed. I've taken the liberty to view your profile and I must say, you have a beautiful, graceful and classy looking family. May God continue to bless you beautiful lady! 🎀
Terrorists will love it!
কার সাথে
That's awesome guys the world just become a better place .

Everyone keeps talking about Facebook.  Aren't we actually talking about the Internet?  
They are not the same.
Wow. Incredible; now we need to transport people
So how do these people connect to Internet when they barely have electric for lighting?  Priorities
Autumn Cox that is sad. Sorry that is happening to your father. Maybe this is why FB is stepping up to provide affordable internet service.
solar power....windmills.... there's pleanty of ways to generate electricity
